title: Pasta Perfection
text: Indulge in the irresistible flavors of freshly cooked spaghetti carbonara, garnished with grated parmesan cheese and crispy bacon bits. Served with a side of garlic bread.
offer_text: Special Offer: 15% off your first order!

title: Pizza Delight
text: Experience the classic Margherita pizza with hot, melted cheese, vibrant tomato, and basil leaves. It's a slice of pizza heaven.
offer_text: Special Offer: Buy one, get one 50% off on all pizzas!

title: Taste of Tuscany
text: Transport your taste buds to Tuscany with our rustic antipasto platter. Enjoy olives, cured meats, and fresh mozzarella, perfectly complemented by a bottle of red wine.
offer_text: Special Offer: Free bottle of wine with orders over $50!

title: Gelato Delights
text: Savor the sweetness of Italian gelato with a variety of flavors like pistachio, strawberry, and chocolate. Topped with delightful sprinkles and chocolate chips.
offer_text: Special Offer: Buy two scoops, get one free!

title: Family Feast
text: Share a hearty Italian family meal with a bowl of spaghetti and meatballs at the center. Accompanied by salad, garlic knots, and homemade marinara sauce.
offer_text: Special Offer: Family-sized meal for the price of a regular meal!
